data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 3, Cristiano's header is off-target for Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Cristiano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Richardson (Kashiwa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Michael Olunga of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 16, Shu Kurata (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Futoshi Nakamura has awarded Gamba a corner.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Gamba to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Takashi Usami of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 19, Kashiwa push upfield and Cristiano gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Gamba defence.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Suita.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kashiwa.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa are pushing forward but Michael Olunga's finish is wide of the goal.
Futoshi Nakamura awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Gamba will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kashiwa.
In the minute 30, Yuya Fukuda is booked for the home team.
Kashiwa's Ataru Esaka attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in Gamba.
Kashiwa's Cristiano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 37, Gamba needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Patric (Gamba) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 41, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 43, Futoshi Nakamura signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Gamba's Kosuke Onose is on target but unsuccessful.
Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga has run offside.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa are pushing forward but Michael Olunga's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Gamba drives forward and Kosuke Onose gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Patric scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 52, Great play from Takashi Usami to set up the goal.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a throw-in for Kashiwa, close to Gamba's area.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Gamba.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Kashiwa attack but Michael Olunga's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 59, Futoshi Nakamura awards Gamba a goal kick.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 63, Gamba pushes forward through Kosuke Onose, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gamba pushes forward through Patric, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Suita.
In the minute 63, Futoshi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team have replaced Hayato Nakama with Yuta Kamiya. This is the first substitution made today by Nelsinho Baptista.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In Suita, Hidekazu Otani (Kashiwa) misses the target with a header.
Futoshi Nakamura awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Futoshi Nakamura signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Kashiwa's area.
Throw-in Gamba.
Ademilson is replacing Takashi Usami for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 75, In Suita Gamba attack through Ademilson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 77, Futoshi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Goal! Kashiwa go level at 1-1 through Michael Olunga in Suita.
In the minute 80, That's a fine assist from Ataru Esaka.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Gamba make their second substitution with Kazuma Watanabe replacing Patric.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 82, Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's third substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Shinya Yajima replacing Kosuke Onose.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Michael Olunga is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 87, Gamba's Shinya Yajima breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 88, Michael Olunga for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Ademilson.
In the minute 89, Shu Kurata with an assist there.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Suita.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Futoshi Nakamura blows against Kashiwa's Cristiano for offside.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
The home team replace Shu Kurata with Shuhei Kawasaki.
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a second substitution, with Fumiya Unoki replacing Hidekazu Otani.
